revised_title: The Banks Family: Ancestry and Legacy
tldr: This article discusses the history of the Banks family, focusing on the ancestors of Sir Joseph Banks. It traces the family's origins in Yorkshire and their rise to prominence through their legal and political activities. The article also covers the family's connection to Revesby Abbey and their involvement in parliamentary elections, as well as their interest in antiquarian research.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > British History
